metadata.name: Mid-Morning Sriracha Mushroom Omelette Giveaway Plot
metadata.description:
A limited edition free mint recipe visualization for a mushroom omelette. Holders will be air dropped the recipe and an annotated visual at a later date. The piece serves as an educational walk through to help collectors interpret and get the most of current and future releases in the collection, including the Midnight Pancake sister token being offered as part of a fundraising effort for food banks.

So many possibilities exist with the omelette. This particular rendition produces a sweet and spicy complement to any breakfast protein. If mushrooms are not to your liking, we recommend swapping out an equal amount of onions.

For more insights follow @arscibi on Twitter.

Midnight Pancake link: 
https://app.manifold.xyz/c/arscibifoodplot01midnightpancake
